abstract: Technology news site CNET publishes 5,500-word fiction story by novelist Michelle Richmond, first in series from San Francisco Bay area writers.
lead_paragraph: The stories, written by several high-profile Bay Area authors, grew out of an effort to attract new audiences to the site.

headline.main: Tech Site CNET Tries Something Completely Different: Publishing Fiction
headline.print_headline: A Site for Technology News Expands Into Storytelling

snippet: The stories, written by several high-profile Bay Area authors, grew out of an effort to attract new audiences to the site.
